Game's Text: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.
In-Depth Effect: Sleep conditions lasts for half as long, rounding down. For example, half of three turns is 1.5, which rounds down to one turn. When the number of turns to sleep is one, half of this rounded down is zero, and the Pokémon wakes up instantly.

Game's Text: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.

Game's Text: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
In-Depth Effect: The user recovers 25% of its maximum Hit Points when a Ground-type move is used against it

Game's Text: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
In-Depth Effect: Damage by super-effective moves is reduced by 25%.

Game's Text: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
In-Depth Effect: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with Burn when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokémon.

Game's Text: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
In-Depth Effect: Activates when user is hit by a damaging Fire-type move (including Fire-type Hidden Power). Once activated, user’s Fire-type moves deal 1.5 times damage. While this ability is in effect, this Pokémon is immune to damage from Fire-type attacks and Fire-type Hidden Power (accuracy and effect from these moves are ignored). For Fire-type Pokémon with this ability, Will-O-Wisp activates this ability without having an effect. If a non-Fire-type Pokémon has this ability, Will-O-Wisp will activate the ability and will have an effect.

Game's Text: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
In-Depth Effect: Upon entering battle, the opponent’s Attack lowers one stage. In a Double Battle, both opponents’ Attack are lowered. In a link battle, if both sides switch on the same turn, and first player sends out a Pokémon with Intimidate, the opponent’s Attack will be lowered before the opponent’s Pokémon switches.

Game's Text: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit  by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
In-Depth Effect: Water-type moves are drawn to this Pokémon. Water-type moves will do no damage and the Pokémon's SP ATK is raised one stage

Game's Text: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
In-Depth Effect: The Pokémon will remain with 1 HP if it was going to be knocked out by a move when at full Hit Points, and it is immune to One Hit KO moves.

Game's Text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
In-Depth Effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Bug-type moves is increased by 50%.

Game's Text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.
The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.
In-Depth Effect: When this Pokémon becomes Poisoned, Paralyzed, or Burned, so does the opponent. However, Fire-type and Water Veil ability Pokémon cannot be Burned, Poison-type and Steel-type and Immunity ability Pokémon cannot be Poisoned, and Limber ability Pokémon cannot be Paralyzed.

Game's Text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.
Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
In-Depth Effect: Pokémon’s evasion raises one level when Confused.

Game's Text: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
In-Depth Effect: Moves with a base power of 60 or less are boosted in power by 50%

Game's Text: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
In-Depth Effect: Prevents damage from team-mates during Double and Triple battles
